name: Sneaky St. Nick
description:
It's Christmas time, that magical time of the year where good girls and boys get presents! Take the role of Santa as you go to several differents houses! Watch out! The kids have been trying to get a giimpse of you for a while! Don't let them see you!

C = Place Gift at Tree

X = Place Bone for Dog

Arrows = Move/ Select Level

Enter = Select Level / Pause
